name: Super Hiper Luminum Gun
description:
Small arcade shooter where the only goal is to achieve the highest score possible. Developed for the Epic MegaJam.

Any feedback is welcome. We hope you enjoy it!

Controls:
Left click - Fire
Space - Swap level
P/Esc - Open Pause Menu

Developed by:
Carlos Arán Tapia: Programming
Ignacio Rodríguez Ramírez: Art
Juan Jesús Mena Carmona: Audio
